g.text: Creating a camt.026 financial message on the server side
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a camt.026 financial message in base64 encoding for signing
Gets a signed camt.026 financial message
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a response to the Payment Cancelation Request
Sends a query to extract the Payment Cancelation Request due to the impossibility of execution
with the “payment” argument in the query parameters
Creating a camt.087 financial message on the server side
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a camt.087 financial message in base64 encoding for signing
Gets a signed camt.087 financial message
Payload generation on the server side
Sends a query to extract the Payment Modify Request
with the “payment” argument in the query parameters
